collectors.configuration: {"data-source-name":"AppCHANGEIT","collector-name":"eDir Account 1k 3.6.3","collectorType":"ACCOUNT","service-identifier":"CSVAccountTemplate-46-56-c3fe4d28afed4bbe9058e9168d820f39","class":"com.netiq.daas.nativecsvservice.NativeCSVService","allow-connection-test":true,"version":"3.6.2","ecma-scripts":[{"name":"eDir_Date_UTCSeconds","description":"Converts eDirectory native date value to GMT format","script":"var yearStr=inputValue.substring(0,4); var month=inputValue.substring(4,6) - 1; var day = inputValue.substring(6,8); var hour=inputValue.substring(8,10); var minute=inputValue.substring(10,12); var second=inputValue.substring(12, 14); var newdate = new Date(Date.UTC(yearStr,month,day,hour,minute,second)); finalDate = newdate.getTime().toString(); outputValue=finalDate;"},{"name":"eDir_Alias_List","description":"Retrieve array of account aliases","script":"\/* Put all non-null values of all JSON fields into an array *\/var jObject = JSON.parse(inputValue);var aliasArray = [];if ((jObject.fullName !== undefined) && (jObject.fullName.length > 0)) {aliasArray.push(jObject.fullName);} if ((jObject.OBJ_ID !== undefined) && (jObject.OBJ_ID.length > 0)) {aliasArray.push(jObject.OBJ_ID);} outputValue = JSON.stringify(aliasArray);"}],"service-parms":[{"name":"use_bridge_connector","display-name":"Use Cloud Bridge connector?","description":"Select 'No' if the collector will connect directly to the CSV files.  Select 'Yes' if the collector will access CSV files via the Cloud Bridge.","data-type":"string","default-value":0,"value":0,"required":true,"options":[{"display-name":"Yes","value":1},{"display-name":"No","value":0}],"data_source_connection_parm":false},{"name":"data_source_conn_id","display-name":"Select a Cloud Bridge Data Source Connection","description":"Choose the Cloud Bridge Data Source Connection that provides connectivity for this collector","data-type":"string","default-value":0,"value":0,"required":true,"hidden":true,"options":[{"display-name":"(Select a Data Source Connection)","value":0}],"conditional_param":{"use_bridge_connector":1},"data_source_connection_parm":false},{"name":"file-path","display-name":"Root file path","description":"Root file path for all CSV files named in this collector. The end of the path must include the path separator!","data-type":"string","value":"\/home\/csv\/","required":false,"options":null,"data_source_connection_parm":false},{"name":"chunk-request-ttl","display-name":"Batch Collection Session Timeout Value","description":"Number of seconds of idle time before a batched collection session is terminated","data-type":"numeric","value":60,"required":false,"options":null,"data_source_connection_parm":false},{"name":"page-size-limit","display-name":"Batch Size Limit","description":"Maximum Paged Response Size (0=no maximum)","data-type":"numeric","value":0,"required":false,"options":null,"data_source_connection_parm":false}],"views":[{"name":"account","display-name":"Account","collection-required":true,"collect":true,"input-transforms":[{"view-name":"lastLogin","script-name":"eDir_Date_UTCSeconds"},{"view-name":"aliases","script-name":"eDir_Alias_List"}],"view-parms":[{"name":"file-name","description":"Text file name","required":true,"value":"ACCOUNT_CHANGEIT.csv","display-name":"File Name","data-type":"string"},{"name":"row-pattern","description":"Empty string if header row is included in the file, otherwise row pattern for the User data e.g. id,cn,sn","required":false,"value":"","display-name":"Row Pattern","data-type":"string"},{"name":"field-delimiter","description":"Character used as column separator","required":false,"value":",","display-name":"Column Delimiter","data-type":"string"},{"name":"multi-value-delimiter","description":"Delimiter for multiple values in a single column","required":false,"value":"|","display-name":"Multiple-value Delimiter","data-type":"string"},{"name":"quote-character","description":"Character used to enclose quoted string values","required":false,"value":"\"","display-name":"Quote Character","data-type":"string"},{"name":"escape-character","description":"Character used to indicate an escaped character is present","required":false,"value":"~","display-name":"Escape Character","data-type":"string"},{"name":"trim-values","description":"Trim leading and trailing whitespace","required":false,"value":true,"display-name":"Trim Values","data-type":"boolean"},{"name":"key-field","description":"Column name that uniquely identifies the object represented by the row data","required":false,"value":"","display-name":"Unique ID","data-type":"string"},{"name":"security-cert","description":"Base64 encoded Certificate required for https file collection","required":false,"value":"","display-name":"Security Certificate","data-type":"string"}],"schema-map-filter":{"generic-map":[{"view-name":"accountId","app-name":"OBJ_ID","required":true},{"view-name":"name","app-name":"cn","required":false},{"view-name":"description","app-name":"description","required":false},{"view-name":"disabled","app-name":"loginDisabled","required":false},{"view-name":"lastLogin","app-name":"loginTime","required":false},{"view-name":"privileged","required":false,"static-value":"false"},{"view-name":"aliases","app-name":"[\"fullName\",\"OBJ_ID\"]","required":false},{"view-name":"connAcctId","app-name":"OBJ_ID","required":false},{"view-name":"userLink","app-name":"OBJ_ID","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"type","app-name":"employeeType","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"userId","app-name":"","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"state","app-name":"","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"cost","app-name":"","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"risk","app-name":"","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"collectedUsersOwners","app-name":"workforceID","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"idmAccountId","app-name":"uid","required":false,"read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"ext_account_security_clearance","required":false,"static-value":"True","read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"ext_account_security_authorization","required":false,"static-value":"01927-478","read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"ext_account_provisioning_date","required":false,"static-value":"02\/18\/2021","read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"ext_account_created_by","required":false,"static-value":"MicroFocus","read-only-mapping":false,"hidden":false},{"view-name":"ext_account_details","required":false,"static-value":
